Title: Requires certain public and nonpublic schools to provide transportation or reimburse costs incurred for such transportation for certain students
Summary: Requires certain public and nonpublic schools to provide transportation or reimburse costs incurred for such transportation for certain students residing in an area containing at least three hundred students within a one-mile radius.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring certain public and nonpublic schools to provide transportation or reimbursement for transportation for certain students residing in an area containing at least three hundred students within a one-mile radius
